Package de.samdev.absgdx.framework.menu.agdxml

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AgdxmlGridDefinitions
    This class holds a set of Row/Column definitions (from an AGDXML grid tag) this class is immutable
    AgdxmlLayerBoundaryElement
    Contains size and position information of an AGDXML element
    AgdxmlParser
    This class is used to parse an AGDXML file for the AGDXML Layer class Use the parse() method to create an layout and the update() method to update an layout (e.g.
    AgdxmlTextureProviderIDMap
    This class maps the IDs used in an AGDXML file to specific objects For example: - the field 'textures' gets mapped to an GUITextureProvider - the field 'texture' (in the image tag) gets mapped to an TextureRegion[]
    AgdxmlValue
    A single AGDXML value (eg position, width, height ...) this is an immutable class
    AgdxmlVectorValue
    A 2 Tuple consisting of two AgdxmlValue's (Immutable class)
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AgdxmlValueUnit
    Represents the unit of a value in an AGDXML file
